markdown:
Fjord linnorms make their homes in damp caves behind ice-cold waterfalls in the river-veined coastal reaches of the north. While they may appear graceful as they swim up the fjords for which they're named, they are as vile as any other of their species and take pleasures in capsizing river boats before gobbling up their terrified crews. **[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)): DC 37 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 [Fjord Linnorm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=721) **Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 165 2.0 **Perception** +28; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent (imprecise) 60 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33), [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +27, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +33, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +29 **Str** +9 **Dex** +5 **Con** +8 **Int** -3 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +7 --- **AC** 40 **Fort** +30 **Ref** +28 **Will** +24 +1 status to all saves vs. magic **HP** 315 , regeneration 10 (deactivated by cold iron) **Immunities** cold, [curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145) **Weaknesses** cold iron 15 **Curse of Stolen Breath** ([curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) When a creature slays a fjord linnorm, it must succeed at a DC 41 Will save or become unable to ever breathe underwater (either via a natural ability or a spell such as [_water breathing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=370)). In addition, the victim can hold its breath only half as long as normal, and whenever it holds its breath it becomes [sickened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34).
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** Tail only. --- **Speed** 35 feet, fly 75 feet, swim 50 feet; [_freedom of movement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=128) **Melee** jaws +33 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d12+17 piercing plus fjord linnorm venom **Melee** claw +33 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d10+17 slashing **Melee** tail +33 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 25 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d6+15 bludgeoning plus [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=27) **Primal Innate Spells** DC 37 - **Constant (6th)** [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) - **Constant (7th)** [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128) **Breath Weapon** ([Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The fjord linnorm expels a 120-foot line of icy bile, dealing 17d6 cold damage to creatures within the area (DC 37 basic Reflex save). Any creature that fails its save is covered by the ice, which freezes and fuses with the creature's skin, giving it a –10-foot penalty to Speed. A creature can [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) or [Force Open](/Actions.aspx?ID=34) the ice (DC 34) to free itself; otherwise, the ice remains for 1 minute. The fjord linnorm can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds. **Fjord Linnorm Venom** ([Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 37 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 10 rounds; **Stage 1** 4d6 cold damage and [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) (1 round); **Stage 2** 6d6 cold damage and clumsy 2 (1 round)
name: Fjord Linnorm

text: Fjord Linnorm Fjord linnorms make their homes in damp caves behind ice-cold waterfalls in the river-veined coastal reaches of the north. While they may appear graceful as they swim up the fjords for which they're named, they are as vile as any other of their species and take pleasures in capsizing river boats before gobbling up their terrified crews.
